amendatorysection.catchline: Navigator; individual with existing health insurance coverage; information.
amendatorysection.para: On contact with an individual who acknowledges having existing health insurance coverage obtained through a licensed insurance producer, a navigator shall make a reasonable effort to inform the individual that he or she may, but is not required to, seek further assistance from that producer or another licensed producer for information, assistance, and any other services and that tax credits may not be available to offset the premium cost of plans that are marketed outside of the exchange.
